contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Isorella | official_name = Comune di Isorella | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 18 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 10 |longm = 19 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = {{RegioneIT|sigla=LOM}} | province = {{ProvinciaIT (short form)|sigla=BS}} (BS) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = Francesco Piccinelli | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 15 | population_footnotes = <ref>Population from [[Istituto Nazionale di Statistica|ISTAT]]</ref> | population_total = 4054 | population_as_of = 1 December 2008 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Isorellesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = 48 | elevation_max_m = 60 | elevation_m = | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = [[San Rocco]] | day = 16 August | postal_code = 25010 | area_code = 030 | website = {{official|http://www.comune.isorella.bs.it/}} | footnotes = <!-- These are currently unused --> | istat = 017086 | fractions = [[Calvisano]], [[Gambara]], [[Ghedi]], [[Gottolengo]], [[Remedello]], [[Visano]] | fiscal_code = E364 }} '''Isorella''' is a [[town]] and ''[[comune]]'' in the [[province of Brescia]], in [[Lombardy]].<!-- It is bounded by other communes of--> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Province of Brescia}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Lombardy]] {{Lombardy-geo-stub}}
